description: A batched data object describing the lifecycle of an auction or multiple auction across a single page view.
title: Prebid Auctions

___clientLatencyMillis.description: Latency from auction start to bid response recieved in milliseconds.

___params.description: A copy of the bid.params from the adUnit.bids

___bidId.description: UUID representing this individual bid request in this auction.

$eref.description: Size object representing the dimensions of creative in pixels.

___dealId.description: The id associated with any potential deals

___bidPriceUSD.description: The bid value denoted in USD

_88videoAdFormat.description: This value only provided for video specifies the ad format

_88samplingFactor.description: An integer value representing the factor to multiply event count by to receive unsampled count.

_88dimensions.description: Size object representing the dimensions of creative in pixels.

___integration.description: Integration type that generated this event.

___version.description: Version of Prebid.js responsible for the auctions contained within.

___clientTimeoutMillis.description: Timeout given in client for given auction in milliseconds (if applicable).

items.description: An array of adUnits involved in this auction.

___bids.description: An array that contains a combination of the bids from the adUnit combined with their responses.

___clientLatencyMillis.description: Latency from auction start to bid response recieved in milliseconds.

___params.description: A copy of the bid.params from the adUnit.bids

___bidId.description: UUID representing this individual bid request in this auction.

___dealId.description: The id associated with any potential deals

___bidPriceUSD.description: The bid value denoted in USD

___dimensions.description: All valid sizes included in this auction (note: may be sizeConfig filtered).

$eref.description: Size object representing the dimensions of creative in pixels.

___transactionId.description: The UUID generated id to represent this adunit in this auction.

$eref.description: This value only provided for video specifies the ad format

___serverTimeoutMillis.description: Timeout configured for server adapter request in milliseconds (if applicable).

$eref.description: An integer value representing the factor to multiply event count by to receive unsampled count.

___accountId.description: The account id for prebid server (if applicable).

___clientLatencyMillis.description: Latency from auction start to bid response recieved in milliseconds.

___params.description: A copy of the bid.params from the adUnit.bids

___bidId.description: UUID representing this individual bid request in this auction.

___dealId.description: The id associated with any potential deals

___bidPriceUSD.description: The bid value denoted in USD

___bidwonStatus.description: Whether the bid was successfully rendered or not

$eref.description: An integer value representing the factor to multiply event count by to receive unsampled count.
This value only provided for video specifies the ad format

___eventTimeMillis.description: Unix timestamp of time of creation for this batched event in milliseconds.
